sourceMeaningMnemonic: You <radical>stand</radical> your <radical>towel</radical> up so everyone can see it. This announces that you are the <kanji>sovereign</kanji> ruler of this bathroom.
meaningInfo: Whenever someone walks into your bathroom, you start screaming that you are the sovereign ruler of this toilet, this sink, this toothbrush, and all that touch these tiles.
readingMnemonic: As the <kanji>sovereign</kanji> ruler of this bathroom, you must choose a monogram to represent your rule. For this, you choose the symbol of the food that passes through you the most: The mighty <reading>ta</reading>ter (<ja>てい</ja>) tot!
readingInfo: Picture your standing towel with a huge tater tot sewn into it. Everyone who sees this will know that you're the toilet tater tot sovereign.
